Create Single Stack Plot (Internal)

Source: R/plot.R
dot-create_single_stack_plot.Rd

Creates a single stacked bar plot with given parameters and total labels.

Usage

.create_single_stack_plot(
  data,
  total_data,
  x_axis_from,
  stack_value_from,
  plot_title,
  y_axis_title,
  compare_by_experiment,
  color_tone,
  panel_rows,
  panel_cols,
  show_total = TRUE,
  legend_position = "bottom",
  y_limit = NULL
)

Arguments

data

Data frame containing the data for the plot

total_data

Data frame containing total values per group

x_axis_from

Column name to use for x-axis

stack_value_from

Column name containing the stack categories

plot_title

Title for the plot

y_axis_title

Label for the y-axis

compare_by_experiment

Logical. If TRUE, compares x-axis values within experiments

color_tone

Base color for the plot

panel_rows

Number of panel rows

panel_cols

Number of panel columns

legend_position

Position of the legend

y_limit

Optional y-axis limits

Value

A ggplot object
